name: Bane Malar, Spice Addict
Lore: 'Black Sun agent, Assassin, and Bounty Hunter.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, may ''mindscan'' by placing a card from hand on your Used Pile; choose: until end of turn Malar is power +2 and may fire a weapon twice per battle. OR peek at the top X cards of your Force pile where X = number of characters here.',
